choices.title: Character Archetype
choices.description: The archetype from which your character descends

options.title: Human Hunter
options.description: You spent your days hunting & foraging, learning to track and move silently. Your expertise was often employed by men of the law to aid in the tracking of outlaws. You skill with the bow is unmatched. Gain a bow

data.name: Short Bow
data.desc: A hunter's shortbow, nimble and quick to fire

options.title: Human Warrior
options.description: Raised in the blood of battle you had once protected the lands of your lord from the violent beasts the prowl the land. Your fearlessness in battlewhen destroying corrupted beasts has made you an granted you the capacity to speak the tongue of deathwatch carrion crows.

data.name: Stout Shield
data.desc: A fine, hardy, shield, painted with family heraldry

data.name: Battle Axe
data.desc: A heavy, well balanced warriors axe, worn, but still to be greatly feared

data.name: Carrion Tongue
data.desc: The capacity to speak the tongue of crows

choices.title: Origin
choices.description: The tale of your birth & childhood.

data.name: Origoth Lantern
data.desc: Famed for their compact size & brigth light, it is a token of your childhood

choices.title: Allies
choices.description: Brothers sworn to your side, and who can be called upon in times of trouble

options.title: Aefild 'Mad Axe' Erifson
options.description: A seemingly quiet and unassuming man of strong stature, but once his blood has risen, his beserker rage can unnerve evens the most Stallwart warrior. Likes cats, hates bards.

data.name: Aefild 'Mad Axe' Erifson
data.desc: A quiet man, quick to a powerful beserker rage. +cats, -bards

options.title: Karrick 'Steel' Olborn
options.description: A grumpy dwarven drunkard, best known for his cunning and unorthodox methods of combat and problem solving, his plans always catch the enemy by surprise, but that desn't mean they'll work. Likes curvy women, hates sheriffs.

data.name: Karrick 'Steel' Olborn
data.desc: Grumpy dwarven drunkard, cunning, if dangerous planner. +chubby ladies, -sheriffs

choices.title: Items
choices.description: The right equipment can keep you alive when teh tide turns against you.

options.title: Elixir of heaven's dew
options.description: A misty honey colored draught, gathered by the druids of the forbidden circle, this potion can cure it's drinker of mortal wounds, returning them to a youthful health within a few days of imbibement

data.name: Elixir of heaven's dew
data.desc: Honey potion, cures mortal wounds over 3 days

options.title: Mechanical Talisman
options.description: Can tell it's user of approaching dangers and which direction they are coming. Limited to slightly under a mile in range, but directionality decreases in accuracy at further ranges

data.name: Mechanical Talisman
data.desc: Indicates danger, and direction, though less accurate futher away, max range under a mile
